text.section:
A small employer that provides a small employer health benefit plan that is compatible with a health savings account may be eligible for a subsidy under the Program if:
the health benefit plan is offered with a wellness benefit; and
the small employer meets the eligibility requirements under § 15-12A-03 of this subtitle.

For the purpose of calculating the subsidy for a small employer under § 15-12A-03 of this subtitle, the Commission shall consider amounts contributed to the health savings account by a small employer that is eligible for a subsidy as additional premium contributions.

For the purpose of calculating the subsidy for an employee of a small employer under § 15-12A-03 of this subtitle, the Commission shall consider amounts contributed to the health savings account by an employee of a small employer that is eligible for a subsidy as additional premium contributions.
